mapper.select: select t1.apply_id role_apply_id, t1.role_id, t2.`name` role_name, t2.approver_emp, t2.business_line, t3.account_name apply_account_name, t4.staff_num apply_staff_num, t4.staff_name apply_staff_name, t5.department_name apply_department_name, t1.apply_time , t1.`status`, t1.modify_emp, t1.modify_time, t1.reject_reason from t_role_apply t1,t_role_info t2,t_account t3,t_staff t4 ,t_department t5 where t1.role_id=t2.id and t1.apply_id=t4.id and t3.staff_id=t4.id and t5.id=t4.department_id
